code: import axios from'axios';import ENV from'./../config/base-env';export const getList=(params,token)=>{const queryString=new URLSearchParams(params).toString();return axios.get("".concat(ENV.API,"/attenders?").concat(queryString),{headers:{Authorization:token}});};export const getDetail=(id,token)=>{return axios.get("".concat(ENV.API,"/attender/").concat(id),{headers:{Authorization:token}});};export const displayed=(id,token)=>{return axios.get("".concat(ENV.API,"/attender/active/").concat(id),{headers:{Authorization:token}});};export const notDisplayed=(id,token)=>{return axios.get("".concat(ENV.API,"/attender/inactive/").concat(id),{headers:{Authorization:token}});};export const remove=(id,token)=>{return axios.delete("".concat(ENV.API,"/attender/").concat(id),{headers:{Authorization:token}});};export const attend=(dataScan,token)=>{return axios.put("".concat(ENV.API,"/attender/attend"),{token:dataScan},{headers:{Authorization:token}});};export const submitReservation=(params,token)=>{let formData=new FormData();formData.set('name',params===null||params===void 0?void 0:params.fullname);formData.set('email',params===null||params===void 0?void 0:params.email);formData.set('participants',params===null||params===void 0?void 0:params.participant);formData.set('attendance',params===null||params===void 0?void 0:params.attendance);formData.set('comment',params===null||params===void 0?void 0:params.comment);return axios.post("".concat(ENV.API,"/attender"),formData,{headers:{Authorization:token}});};export const getCommentList=()=>{return axios.get("".concat(ENV.API,"/attender/displayed-comments"));};export const regenerateQr=(id,token)=>{return axios.get("".concat(ENV.API,"/attender/regenerate-qr/").concat(id),{headers:{Authorization:token}});};
